Topic.Title: OBAMA SHOW US YOUR GRADES ! WHY ARE THEY SEALED FROM THE AMERICAN PEOPLE ! NO OTHER PRESIDENT HAS EVER SEALED THEM BEFORE

Message.Msg: “OBAMA SHOW US YOUR GRADES ! WHY ARE THEY SEALED FROM THE AMERICAN PEOPLE ! NO OTHER PRESIDENT HAS EVER SEALED THEM BEFORE” – another birther-nut shouting in ALL CAPS In a column entitled, “How They Did in Law School”, published Dec. 22, 2011, New York Magazine said this: About Obama: “(At Harvard Law School)… he became a research assistant to Laurence Tribe, a renowned professor working on an article applying physics to the law. ‘I thought … his talents are such that there's no ceiling to what he could achieve — and that included becoming president of the United States," Tribe told New York. ‘He's the only student about whom I've ever had that thought.’ By the end of his first year, Obama had won a position on the Harvard Law Review, widely considered the most influential and prestigious law publication in the nation. In 1990, Obama earned national recognition for the first time when he was elected the Review’s first black president. Obama graduated MAGNA cum laude and moved back to Chicago.” About Romney: “Romney enrolled in a joint program at Harvard Law School and Harvard Business School. At law school, he graduated cum laude, doing quite well with one particularly prominent professor: Supreme Court Associate Justice Stephen Breyer, who taught Romney antitrust law.” A quick review for you Birthers who are clamoring about seeing Obama’s grades, yet normally ridicule education and want to do away with the Dept. of Ed. Romney - Cum Laude (Latin for “with honor” – generally a GPA of 3.5 to 3.74 Obama MAGNA Cum Laude (Latin for “with great honor) - generally a GPA of 3.75 to 4.0 We know you can barely read English, let alone Latin, but how are you with basic math? Let us help you. 3.75 to 4 (Obama’s GPA) is higher than 3.5 to 3.74 (Romney’s GPA) at Harvard Law School. I hope this answers your question. Now could you return the favor? Where are Mr. Romney’s tax returns and what is he hiding? Are you seriously going to vote for a candidate who knows he’s being called a vulture capitalist, but still won’t show his tax returns to disprove those charges? Now there’s a rhetorical question. Of course you are. Your problem is that not too many other middle-class folks will be joining you in November. Keep at the birther nonsense – it’s served you well thus far (if your goal was to look really goofy and alienate yourselves from sane people) - but this one’s over, kids.

Topic.Title: OBAMA SHOW US YOUR GRADES ! WHY ARE THEY SEALED FROM THE AMERICAN PEOPLE ! NO OTHER PRESIDENT HAS EVER SEALED THEM BEFORE

Message.Msg: What did Obama did on 911 is disgusting Obama Releases Message to Arab Forum on 9/11 Not only is Barack Obama violating his pledge not to campaign on 9/11, but he is also using the day to issue greetings to the Arab Forum on Asset Recovery, seemingly oblivious to the importance and solemnity of the day, as well as the context of his message. Obama offers thanks to the Emir of Qatar--showboating some rather halting Arabic skills in addressing "His Highness Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani"--and praising the inspiring democratic example of the Arab Spring, which happened to leave the absolute monarchy of Qatar untouched. He also offers support for his envoys, including Attorney General Eric Holder, who is attending the Arab Forum conference as the chief U.S. representative. The Arab Forum's goal is to recover assets stolen by formerly autocratic regimes, including Tunisia, Egypt, and Libya. (But not Qatar.) The video, posted on the White House YouTube channel today, makes no mention of 9/11, the rise of the Muslim Brotherhood, or the role of Qatar-based Al Jazeera in broadcasting radical anti-American propaganda. And while offering support for democratic change, Obama neglects to ask the Emir to step aside. Ironically, Obama caused a scandal last year when CBS News caught him criticizing the Emir of Qatar after reporters had left a fundraiser in Chicago: "He is a big booster, a big promoter of democracy all throughout the Middle East...He himself is not reforming significantly. There is no big move towards democracy in Qatar." Obama has evidently chosen to make up for the insult--by insulting fellow Americans on 9/11.

Message.Title: DNC insults American veterans with Russian Warship tribute
Message.Msg: Was this dilebrate or more democrat incompetence? The backdrop for a Democratic National Convention tribute to U.S. military veterans was a fleet of Russian warships.The event occurred on the final night of last week’s convention when ships from the Russian Navy were displayed on a gigantic screen . The background shows several ships with radar designs apparently not used in the U.S. fleet. Veteran Rob Barker reportedly said his assignment as an electronics warfare technician included the identification of foreign ships by their radars. Several experts identified the ships as being Russian. The Democratic National Convention Committee was contacted Wednesday but did not comment. The ships are definitely Russian,” said author Norman Polmar, a naval and aviation expert.

Message.Msg: Teddy Roosevelt said "Speak softly and carry a big stick." From your comment, it is clear you have no idea what that means. I'll also note that by your ridiculous statement, you think the US should have invaded Kenya, Tanzania and Jordan in the 1990s. National security requires cooler, calmer and better heads than yours. For you and Romney to imply the President of the United States sympathizes with Bin Laden for 9/11 and the people responsible for the murder of a US Ambassador and embassy staff is disgusting and divisive-- and at the very time we should be united.
